```{r data generation, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
library("prob")
sc <- NULL
while(is.null(sc)) {
  sides <- c(5, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12)
  n_sides <- sample(sides, 1)
  S <- rolldie(2, nsides = n_sides, makespace = TRUE)
  S <- addrv(S, Y = X1 * X2)
  YY <- unique(S$Y)
  max_y <- max(YY)
  t_low <- sample(2:6, 1)
  t_high <- sample(7:16, 1)
  
  S1 <- S %>%
    dplyr::filter(
      Y >= t_low & Y <= t_high
    )
  sol <- sum(S1$probs)
  sc <- num_to_schoice(sol, range = c(0, 1), delta = 0.03)
}
```

Question
========
Vengono lanciati due dadi a `r n_sides` facce. Sia la variabile casuale $Y$ il prodotto dei punti dei 2 dadi. Si calcoli la probabilitÃ  dell'evento ($Y \geq$ `r t_low` e $Y \leq$ `r t_high`).

```{r questionlist, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
answerlist(sc$questions, markup = "markdown")
```

Solution
========

```
  sides <- c(5, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12)
  n_sides <- sample(sides, 1)
  S <- rolldie(2, nsides = n_sides, makespace = TRUE)
  S <- addrv(S, Y = X1 * X2)
  YY <- unique(S$Y)
  max_y <- max(YY)
  t_low <- sample(2:6, 1)
  t_high <- sample(7:16, 1)
  
  S1 <- S %>%
    dplyr::filter(
      Y >= t_low & Y <= t_high
    )
  sol <- sum(S1$probs)
  sc <- num_to_schoice(sol, range = c(0, 1), delta = 0.03)
```

```{r solutionlist, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
answerlist(ifelse(sc$solutions, "True", "False"), markup = "markdown")
```
